profile:
Save thousands by dealing directly with a manufacturer! Canadian Choice Windows and Doors Inc. is a leading manufacturer of windows in Canada, serving Ontario. Canadian Choice Windows and Doors offers a huge selection of replacement windows including energy efficient windows, vinyl windows, casement windows, awning windows and bow and bay windows.

Canadian Choice Windows and Doors has been serving Toronto, Richmond Hill, North York, Markham, Mississauga, Oakville, Burlington, Hamilton, Kitchener, Cambridge, Niagra Falls and the surrounding areas as well as in Calgary, Edmonton, Winnipeg and Northern Ontario. 

Why is Canadian Choice Windows and Doors your best solution for window replacement?

1. No Pressure Estimate: take your time & make informed decision

2. Save Money: Energy Star windows will reduce your energy bill by 30 %

3. Professional Installation: flawless installation and thorough clean up by courteous installers

4. High Quality: The highest quality windows in the industry, featuring foam injected honey comb structure.
 
5. Easy Financing: Financing solutions to fit anyoneâ€™s lifestyle

6. Maximum Comfort: low-E coating to reflect summer sun and retain winter heat with our Cardinal Smart Glass system.

7. Zero Maintenance: our windows are easy to clean from within the home and will never fade or discolor

Canadian Choice Windows and Doors is your smartest solution for window and door replacement.

profile:
TEK Climate Heating and Airconditioning. Is a full service heating, ventilation, air-conditioning, gas fitting and refrigeration company. We can take care of all your HVAC/R needs including sheet metal.

We take on everything from small residential installations and service to large commercial installations and service.

We specialize in furnace installations, air conditioning installations, hot water tank installations, tankless installations, heat pump installations, Boiler installations, ductless mini split installations and system installations. We are based in Maple Ridge but cover the entire lower mainland. We also complete furnace repairs, air conditioning repairs, hot water tank repairs, tankless repairs, heat pump repairs, Boiler repairs, ductless mini split repairs and system repairs.
 
Our experience with all types of HVAC/R equipment means we competently service and install all of your equipment. Including, but not limited to furnaces, air-conditioning units, heat pumps, geo-thermal heat pumps, roof top units, ductless splits, tankless on demand hot water heaters, hot water tanks, ventilation equipment, kitchen/restaurant equipment, walk-in coolers, display coolers and building automation systems.
Customer satisfaction is #1 to us. Whether you are a builder, business owner or home owner we work with you to ensure you get exactly what you need. We are committed to providing excellent service and value. Having a great relationship with our wholesalers means we get the best pricing on equipment and can pass that down to the customer.  
 
Chris, owner operator, has 14 years experience in the HVAC/R trade. His vast knowledge and experience in the trade enables TEK Climate Control Systems LTD. To complete all jobs with confidence and personally guarantees all work done by his business.
All of our staff are highly qualified and take great pride in their work. We strive to perform high quality workmanship, Installing only quality products and materials.

profile:
Western Pacific Heating, Cooling & Airflow is a group of quality-obsessed HVAC professionals providing expert HVAC services to our commercial and residential customers throughout the Vancouver lower mainland. 
We specialize in high-quality installations and repairs.

WHAT SETS US APART
1. We take our commitment to quality seriously. Where other companies stop at words, we back it up. We are the only HVAC company in Vancouver with our own in-house dedicated HVAC training academy and weekly technician training sessions. Yes, an in-house training academy is a big commitment of time and resources but regular technician training is the only way we can be sure that you are getting the best-trained and most knowledgeable technicians in the industry. Poorly trained technicians will cost you time and money so don't settle for anything but the best.

2. We are on a mission to increase transparency in the HVAC industry through detailed and open records. We live by 2 simple rules: 
-TEST IT OR YOU ARE JUST GUESSING 
-WRITE IT DOWN OR IT NEVER HAPPENED. 
For every job, we send you extremely detailed records complete with pictures, tech notes, estimates, and other important information; we keep all of these on file in case you ever need them in the future. We take the guesswork out of the situation so that you are always completely clear on what you have paid for. 

3. Flat Rate Prices. We provide a flat rate fixed cost estimate to carry out the repair before starting the work. You are only billed the amount you agreed to before the work is started. This means no surprises and no hidden charges.
